author: Staff Reporter
text:
The district administration will be conducting a special drive for residents who are yet to register their biometric data for obtaining Aadhaar cards.

In a release, Collector S. Suresh Kumar said that a door-to-door drive would be held from January 18 to February 5.

Left out residents

Residents who have not yet received Aadhaar numbers and who have been left out of the National Population Register enrolment will be covered during the drive. The district administration has appealed to the public to cooperate with the officials, who visit their houses, as part of the survey.

Public have been told to provide the information sought by the officials during the survey.
title: Aadhaar special drive from Jan. 18
